title: Lisp in Space
description: Have you ever had a unique approach to a problem and been excited to use it, but you're met with skepticism?Today's story: what happens if you take someone who's passionate about LISP and put them in an organization where that's just not how they write software.Today's story is about getting LISP into space.The year is 1988. The USSR still existed.... [â€¦]
